title: ICE: unsupported character `'{'`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust use proc_macro::{TokenStream, TokenTree, Ident, Span, Punct, Spacing}; #[proc_macro_attribute] pub fn bug_macro(attributes: TokenStream, declaration: TokenStream) -> TokenStream { let tokens: Vec = vec![ TokenTree::Ident(Ident::new("mod", Span::call_site())), TokenTree::Ident(Ident::new("bug_mod", Span::call_site())), TokenTree::Punct(Punct::new('{', Spacing::Alone)), TokenTree::Punct(Punct::new('}', Spacing::Alone)), ]; let mut token_stream = TokenStream::new(); token_stream.extend(tokens.into_iter()); token_stream } ``` ```Rust use bug_macro::bug_macro; #[bug_macro] pub struct SomeStruct; ``` ### Meta stable: `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.54.0 (a178d0322 2021-07-26) binary: rustc commit-hash: a178d0322ce20e33eac124758e837cbd80a6f633 commit-date: 2021-07-26 host: x86_64-pc-windows-msvc release: 1.54.0 LLVM version: 12.0.1 ``` nightly: `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.56.0-nightly (d3e2578c3 2021-08-21) binary: rustc commit-hash: d3e2578c31688619ddc0a10ddf8543bf4ebcba5b commit-date: 2021-08-21 host: x86_64-pc-windows-msvc release: 1.56.0-nightly LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` error: custom attribute panicked --> src\lib.rs:3:1 | 3 | #[bug_macro] | ^^^^^^^^^^^^ | = help: message: unsupported character `'{'` ``` Edited to add: ``` error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md ```
